did.abstract: This collection consists of 12 scripts for radio plays presented as part of the series "Looking Back in Brooklyn," produced by the Brooklyn radio station WLTH from 1933 to 1934. The authors of the plays are not known. One advertising card for WLTH is also included.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of 12 scripts for radio plays presented as part of the series "Looking Back in Brooklyn," produced by the Brooklyn radio station WLTH from 1933 to 1934. The authors of the plays are not known. One advertising card for WLTH is also included.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Robert Barton through WLTH, 1933.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: WLTH was an AM radio station established in Brooklyn in the 1920s. In 1933 and 1934, WLTH collaborated with the Long Island Historical Society (later the Brooklyn Historical Society) to create a series titled "Looking Back in Brooklyn," which was broadcast on Sunday nights at 10:30 and provided dramatized versions of major events in Brooklyn's history. WLTH merged with its time-sharing partners in 1941 and became WBYN.
